name: Chode Loader (C64) Commodore 64
description:
Chode Loader is an infinite shooter, trapped in an infinite cycle  of gaming loading (as in C64 game loading), a zone otherwise know as the Zone of Torture. As a cherubic ball of Chodely humanhood unleash your fury via 99+ red balloons and the infinitely spawning jelly wannabe squid balloonry in the sky.

This is an old-school game designed for high score, which is on the game title page for your pleasure and competitive viewing.

PAL/NTSC Commodore 64. Or free Commodore 64 VICE emulator on any OS.

------------------------

Currently part of Richard B of TND's annual Shoot Em Construction Kit Compo, and also per usual destined for last place because only the few, the proud like cool very strange and super old-school games on the C64 - at least those who vote (PLUS I don't use social media), except when I have an ITCH.

TND is great and a recommended depot to discover tons or free stuff and experience one of the great selfless contributors to the world of Commodore world today, check out the other great SEUCK entries and Richard's site  here: http://www.tnd64.unikat.sk/

You will find me always doing stuff with or for TND. enjoy....
